This communication method between users is seldom used anymore. Setting this should have no impact on normal system operations.

This module sets mesg n instead of mesg -n . In Red Hat Enterprise Linux, the preceding dash is not correct and in Solaris the command will work with or without the dash. This information is provided to help explain false positives produced by other assessment tools.

important.para: This module will not enforce permissions on these files, as other modules are responsible for doing so.
